suite.name: Aitestsuite

kw.name: Given a user is in the "reset" page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: When a valid credential is reset
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Then a reset email is recieved
Open Mailbox
kw.doc: Open IMAP email client session to given ``host`` with given ``user`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Wait For Email
kw.doc: Wait for email message to arrived base on any given filter criteria.

kw.name: Get Links From Email
kw.doc: Returns all links found in the email body from given ``email_index``.

kw.name: Mark Email As Read
kw.doc: Mark email on given ``email_index`` as read.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Given a user is logged in
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.

kw.name: And a user is in the "discussions submit" page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: A test suite with Gherkin style tests. This test is functionally identical to the example in valid_login.robot file.
